meanings.definition: A crisp, flat, thin piece of cornmeal baked until crisp and usually eaten with milk.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, I pour myself a bowl of cornflakes for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: My favorite way to start the day is with a bowl of crunchy cornflakes.
meanings.sent3: I tried to juggle the cornflakes, but they kept slipping through my fingers!
meanings.sent4: The cornflakes scattered on the table like tiny golden leaves.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the cornflakes crunching underfoot was music to my ears.

meanings.definition: A breakfast cereal made from toasted flakes of corn.
meanings.sent1: I like to add fresh fruit to my bowl of cornflakes in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The kids always ask for seconds when I serve them cornflakes for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: I pretended the cornflakes were tiny boats sailing in a sea of milk.
meanings.sent4: The cornflakes shimmered in the sunlight like flakes of gold.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly poured milk over cornflakes filled the kitchen.
